attributes.action: stop my mind seeping away with time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There needs to be a measure of thought to value our experiences.
We fade against breeding and fright from genocidal equilibrium enlightenment rebalancing against our losses.
Thought in IP needs to be measured and remunerated only but always in particular detail.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
